label: 権者
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Gonja (J.) 権者, sometimes pronounced gonza, and also referred to with terms such as 権化, 化者, 大権 gonge, kesha, daigon. A transformation-being, that is, a transformation of a Buddha or bodhisattva.
